targets.rawSql:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT 
    job_id,
    COALESCE(
      data->>'pipeline_name',
      (
        SELECT b2.data->>'pipeline_name'
        FROM batch_jobs_logs b2
        WHERE b2.job_id = batch_jobs_logs.job_id
          AND b2.data->>'pipeline_name' IS NOT NULL
        LIMIT 1
      )
    ) AS pipeline_name_filled,
    to_timestamp((data->>'timestamp')::BIGINT) AS ts,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_properties'->>'ec2_cost_per_hour')::FLOAT AS cost_per_hour,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_metric'->>'system_cpu_utilization')::FLOAT AS cpu_usage,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_metric'->>'system_memory_used')::FLOAT AS mem_used,
    COALESCE((data->'attributes'->'process_dataset_stats'->>'total')::INT, 0) AS processed_dataset
  FROM batch_jobs_logs
),
run_times AS (
  SELECT
    job_id,
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    MIN(ts) AS start_time,
    MAX(ts) AS end_time,
    (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(ts) - MIN(ts))) / 60) AS run_duration_minutes,
    MAX(cost_per_hour) AS cost_per_hour
  FROM base
  GROUP BY job_id, pipeline_name_filled
),
run_costs AS (
  SELECT
    job_id,
    pipeline_name,
    run_duration_minutes * (cost_per_hour / 60) AS total_cost
  FROM run_times
),
pipeline_costs AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name,
    SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost,
    COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) AS run_count
  FROM run_costs
  GROUP BY pipeline_name
),
pipeline_times AS (
  SELECT
    pipeline_name,
    SUM(run_duration_minutes) AS total_run_time_minutes,
    AVG(run_duration_minutes) AS avg_run_time_minutes
  FROM run_times
  GROUP BY pipeline_name
),
pipeline_metrics AS (
  SELECT
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage,
    MAX(cpu_usage) AS max_cpu_usage,
    AVG(mem_used) / 1073741824 AS avg_ram_used_gb
  FROM base
  WHERE pipeline_name_filled IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY pipeline_name_filled
),
run_datasets AS (
  SELECT 
    job_id,
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    MAX(processed_dataset) AS processed_dataset
  FROM base
  GROUP BY job_id, pipeline_name_filled
),
pipeline_datasets AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name,
    SUM(processed_dataset) AS total_processed_datasets
  FROM run_datasets
  GROUP BY pipeline_name
),
pipeline_status AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    MAX(ts) AS last_activity_timestamp
  FROM base
  GROUP BY pipeline_name_filled
)
SELECT
  pm.pipeline_name                  AS "Pipeline Name",
  CASE 
    WHEN ps.last_activity_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 seconds' THEN 'Running'
    ELSE 'Not Running'
  END                               AS "Pipeline Status",
  pm.avg_cpu_usage                  AS "Avg CPU Usage",
  pm.max_cpu_usage                  AS "Max CPU Usage",
  pm.avg_ram_used_gb                AS "Avg RAM Used (GB)",
  COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0)        AS "Total Pipeline Cost",
  COALESCE(pc.run_count, 0)         AS "Number of Runs per Pipeline",
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(pc.run_count, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0) / pc.run_count 
    ELSE 0 
  END                               AS "Avg Cost per Run",
  COALESCE(pt.total_run_time_minutes, 0) AS "Total Pipeline Runtime",
  COALESCE(pt.avg_run_time_minutes, 0)   AS "Single Run Runtime",
  COALESCE(pd.total_processed_datasets, 0) AS "Total Processed Datasets",
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(pd.total_processed_datasets, 0) > 0 
    THEN COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0) / pd.total_processed_datasets 
    ELSE 0 
  END                               AS "Cost per Processed Dataset"
FROM pipeline_metrics pm
LEFT JOIN pipeline_costs pc
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pc.pipeline_name
LEFT JOIN pipeline_times pt
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pt.pipeline_name
LEFT JOIN pipeline_datasets pd
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pd.pipeline_name
LEFT JOIN pipeline_status ps
  ON pm.pipeline_name = ps.pipeline_name
ORDER BY pm.avg_cpu_usage DESC;

WITH base AS (
  SELECT 
    job_id,
    data->'tags' AS tags,  -- Keep tags as JSONB
    COALESCE(
      data->>'pipeline_name',
      (
        SELECT b2.data->>'pipeline_name'
        FROM batch_jobs_logs b2
        WHERE b2.job_id = batch_jobs_logs.job_id
          AND b2.data->>'pipeline_name' IS NOT NULL
        LIMIT 1
      )
    ) AS pipeline_name_filled,
    to_timestamp((data->>'timestamp')::BIGINT) AS ts,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_properties'->>'ec2_cost_per_hour')::FLOAT AS cost_per_hour,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_metric'->>'system_cpu_utilization')::FLOAT AS cpu_usage,
    (data->'attributes'->'system_metric'->>'system_memory_used')::FLOAT AS mem_used,
    COALESCE((data->'attributes'->'process_dataset_stats'->>'total')::INT, 0) AS processed_dataset
  FROM batch_jobs_logs
),
run_times AS (
  SELECT
    job_id,
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    tags,
    MIN(ts) AS start_time,
    MAX(ts) AS end_time,
    (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(ts) - MIN(ts))) / 3600) AS run_duration_hours,  -- Changed to hours for consistency
    MAX(cost_per_hour) AS cost_per_hour
  FROM base
  GROUP BY job_id, pipeline_name_filled, tags
),
run_costs AS (
  SELECT
    job_id,
    pipeline_name,
    tags,
    run_duration_hours * cost_per_hour AS total_cost  -- Corrected cost calculation
  FROM run_times
),
pipeline_costs AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name,
    tags,
    SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost,
    COUNT(DISTINCT job_id) AS run_count
  FROM run_costs
  GROUP BY pipeline_name, tags
),
pipeline_times AS (
  SELECT
    pipeline_name,
    tags,
    SUM(run_duration_hours * 60) AS total_run_time_minutes,  -- Convert back to minutes for display
    AVG(run_duration_hours * 60) AS avg_run_time_minutes     -- Convert back to minutes for display
  FROM run_times
  GROUP BY pipeline_name, tags
),
pipeline_metrics AS (
  SELECT
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    tags,
    AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage,
    MAX(cpu_usage) AS max_cpu_usage,
    AVG(mem_used) / 1073741824 AS avg_ram_used_gb
  FROM base
  WHERE pipeline_name_filled IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY pipeline_name_filled, tags
),
run_datasets AS (
  SELECT 
    job_id,
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    tags,
    MAX(processed_dataset) AS processed_dataset
  FROM base
  GROUP BY job_id, pipeline_name_filled, tags
),
pipeline_datasets AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name,
    tags,
    SUM(processed_dataset) AS total_processed_datasets
  FROM run_datasets
  GROUP BY pipeline_name, tags
),
pipeline_status AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name_filled AS pipeline_name,
    tags,
    MAX(ts) AS last_activity_timestamp
  FROM base
  GROUP BY pipeline_name_filled, tags
),
tag_expansion AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name, 
    tags,
    jsonb_array_elements_text(tags) AS tag
  FROM pipeline_metrics
),
tag_aggregated AS (
  SELECT 
    pipeline_name, 
    tags,
    STRING_AGG(tag, ', ') AS tags_str
  FROM tag_expansion
  GROUP BY pipeline_name, tags
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(NULLIF(pm.pipeline_name, ''), 'pipeline_name_not_available') AS "Pipeline Name",
  COALESCE(ta.tags_str, '')          AS "Tags",
  CASE 
    WHEN ps.last_activity_timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 seconds' THEN 'Running'
    ELSE 'Completed'
  END                               AS "Pipeline Status",
  pm.avg_cpu_usage                  AS "Avg CPU Usage",
  pm.max_cpu_usage                  AS "Max CPU Usage",
  pm.avg_ram_used_gb                AS "Avg RAM Used (GB)",
  COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0)        AS "Total Pipeline Cost",
  COALESCE(pc.run_count, 0)         AS "Number of Runs per Pipeline",
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(pc.run_count, 0) > 0 THEN COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0) / pc.run_count 
    ELSE 0 
  END                               AS "Avg Cost per Run",
  COALESCE(pt.total_run_time_minutes, 0) AS "Total Pipeline Runtime",
  COALESCE(pt.avg_run_time_minutes, 0)   AS "Single Run Runtime",
  COALESCE(pd.total_processed_datasets, 0) AS "Total Processed Datasets",
  CASE 
    WHEN COALESCE(pd.total_processed_datasets, 0) > 0 
    THEN COALESCE(pc.total_cost, 0) / pd.total_processed_datasets 
    ELSE 0 
  END                               AS "Cost per Processed Dataset"
FROM pipeline_metrics pm
LEFT JOIN tag_aggregated ta
  ON pm.pipeline_name = ta.pipeline_name AND pm.tags = ta.tags
LEFT JOIN pipeline_costs pc
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pc.pipeline_name AND pm.tags = pc.tags
LEFT JOIN pipeline_times pt
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pt.pipeline_name AND pm.tags = pt.tags
LEFT JOIN pipeline_datasets pd
  ON pm.pipeline_name = pd.pipeline_name AND pm.tags = pd.tags
LEFT JOIN pipeline_status ps
  ON pm.pipeline_name = ps.pipeline_name AND pm.tags = ps.tags
ORDER BY ps.last_activity_timestamp DESC, COALESCE(pc.run_count, 0) DESC;
